hero.title: Your Vision, Our Business: Together Towards Success

about.title: We Transform Visions into Market Success

history.title: Our Story
history.part1: Success isn't just about great ideas – it's about the perfect combination of strategy, design, and technology. With this conviction, we founded RoketX in 2019 in a Dortmund co-working space.
history.part2: Our mission was clear from the start: to help companies solve complex challenges and turn visions into measurable successes. Start-ups often failed in implementation, while established companies lost touch. This is where we closed the gap – as a one-stop partner for sustainable business success.
history.part3: Today, we inspire, advise, and support start-ups and industry leaders with holistic strategies. With over 100 successfully accompanied projects, we combine strategic precision, creative excellence, and technological innovation. We don't just create solutions – we shape market leaders.

2019.title: The Foundation
2019.description: Started in a Dortmund co-working space with the vision to make digital innovation accessible.

2021.title: Expansion & Growth
2021.description: 50+ successful projects and building a strong partner network.

2024.title: Market Leader
2024.description: 100+ projects, multiple awards, and leading in digital transformation.

about.quote: “Success is no coincidence – it's the result of the right strategy at the right time, with the right partners.”
about.cta: Let's write your success story together

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services
faq.noAnswer: Haven't found the answer to your question?

items.question: What are your core services as a business consultancy?
items.answer: Our core services cover four main areas: Startup All-in-One for new businesses, Digital Transform for digital transformation of existing companies, Makeover for repositioning, and Growth for companies in the growth phase. Each package includes comprehensive services from brand development to business equipment to digital presence.

items.question: What sets roketX apart from other consulting companies?
items.answer: We offer a holistic approach with all-in-one solutions specifically tailored to each business phase. Our unique selling proposition is the combination of strategic consulting and practical implementation - from brand development to technical implementation, all from a single source.

items.question: What company sizes are your services suitable for?
items.answer: Our services are designed for both startups and individual entrepreneurs as well as established medium-sized companies. The packages are flexible and can be adapted to your specific needs, regardless of company size.

items.question: How does the collaboration work specifically?
items.answer: After the initial consultation and package selection, we create a detailed project plan. You receive a personal contact who guides you through the entire process. Implementation takes place step by step according to our proven system, with you being involved in all important decisions.

items.question: How long does it take to implement the various packages?
items.answer: Implementation duration varies depending on package and requirements. Guidelines are: Startup package 8-12 weeks, Digital Transform 8-10 weeks, Makeover 10-12 weeks, and Growth package 10-14 weeks. The exact timeline is coordinated individually with you.

items.question: How flexible are the packages adaptable?
items.answer: All packages can be modularly adapted. We analyze your specific needs and can add or remove services. The basic structure of the packages ensures that all important areas are covered.

items.question: How are the costs structured and what payment options are there?
items.answer: Prices vary depending on package and individual scope. We offer various payment models, from one-time payments to flexible installment plans. In a free initial consultation, we create a customized offer for you.

items.question: What technical services are included in the packages?
items.answer: All packages include professional hosting, SSL certificates, regular backups, and technical support. The mobile and communication packages include all-net flats and data volume. Updates and maintenance are included for 12 months.

header.title: What Our Clients Say
header.subtitle: Learn how we help our clients successfully manage their digital transformation

items.content: Initially, I was skeptical whether an external team would understand our very specific requirements. After the first workshop with roketX, this concern was gone. I particularly appreciated that they constructively challenged us - this led to a much better solution in the end.
items.name: Lisa Burghardt

items.content: As a 40-year-old family business, we struggled with digitalization. We had two failed projects behind us before we met roketX. They first listened carefully and then developed a plan with us step by step. Sure, there were setbacks, but today our digital ordering system works flawlessly.
items.name: Frank Weber

items.content: roketX modernized our patient management system. What others called 'impossible', they solved. Sure, sometimes we had to wait a bit longer for responses when they were busy - but the top quality of the work more than makes up for it.
items.name: Ingridt Lose
items.position: Digital Lead, Schmidt & Partners Medical Practice

items.content: After 6 months of collaboration, I can say: The investment was worth it. Our new CRM system saves the team at least 2 hours of work time daily. What I particularly like: The colleagues at roketX are still accessible after go-live if something gets stuck.
items.name: Yusuf Karadas

items.content: Finally, an IT service provider who doesn't speak in technical jargon! The team managed to explain complex topics to us in a way that even our non-technical employees understood everything. The new intranet was therefore very well received by everyone - and that's saying something with 200 employees!
items.name: Marina Kovač

terms.title: General Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: The framework conditions of our cooperation

sections.title: §1 Scope and Provider
content: (1) These General Terms and Conditions apply to all orders, services, and deliverables between TREU Service GmbH - hereinafter referred to as 'roketX' - and the client.
TREU Service GmbH
Rheinische Straße 220
44147 Dortmund
Commercial Register: HRB 20627
Registry Court: Dortmund

sections.title: §2 Subject Matter of Contract
content: (1) RoketX offers the following services:
- Start-up All-in-One
- Digital Transformation
- Brand Makeover
- Growth
(2) The exact scope of services is defined in the respective service description in the offer.

sections.title: §3 Conclusion of Contract
content: (1) The presentation of services does not constitute a legally binding offer.
(2) After receiving an inquiry, RoketX creates an individual offer. The contract is concluded when the client accepts the offer.

sections.title: §4 Remuneration and Payment Terms
content: (1) Remuneration is based on the agreed package price or hourly rate.
(2) All prices are subject to statutory VAT.
(3) Payment is made by bank transfer and is due as follows:
- 50% of the remuneration upon conclusion of contract
- 50% after completion or acceptance

sections.title: §5 Service Provision and Cooperation Obligations
content: (1) RoketX provides the agreed services to the best of its knowledge and belief.
(2) The client is obligated to provide RoketX with all documents and information necessary for the provision of services in a timely manner.

sections.title: §6 Acceptance
content: (1) After completion of the agreed services, the client will be requested to accept the work.
(2) Acceptance is deemed to have occurred if the client does not report significant defects in writing within 14 days after being requested to accept.

sections.title: §7 Termination and Cancellation
content: (1) The contract can be terminated by either party with 30 days notice to the end of the month.
(2) In case of cancellation by the client, the following cancellation fees apply:
- Up to 14 days before project start: 25% of the order sum
- Up to 7 days before project start: 50% of the order sum
- Thereafter: 75% of the order sum

sections.title: §8 Warranty and Liability
content: (1) RoketX is only liable for damages in case of intent or gross negligence.
(2) Liability is limited to foreseeable, typically occurring damage.
(3) The warranty period is 12 months from acceptance.

sections.title: §9 Confidentiality and Data Protection
content: (1) Both parties commit to treating all information obtained during the cooperation as confidential.
(2) The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with our privacy policy.

sections.title: §10 Final Provisions
content: (1) The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
(2) The place of jurisdiction for all disputes is Dortmund.
(3) Should individual provisions of these terms be invalid, the validity of the remaining provisions shall remain unaffected.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Information about data protection and your rights

sections.title: Responsible Entity
content: TREU Service GmbH
Rheinische Straße 220
44147 Dortmund
Email: info@roketx.de

sections.title: Basic Information
content: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope, and purpose of the processing of personal data on our website.
Personal data is information that relates to an identified or identifiable natural person.

sections.title: Cookies
content: Our website uses cookies. These are small text files that are stored on your device. Your browser accesses these files.
We use the following types of cookies:
- Technically necessary cookies: These are required for the basic functions of the website to work properly.
- Preference cookies: These allow the website to remember information that affects the behavior or appearance of the website.
You can set your browser to inform you about the setting of cookies and decide individually about their acceptance or exclude the acceptance of cookies in general.

sections.title: Social Media Plugins
content: Social media plugins from Instagram are integrated on our website. When you visit a page on our website that contains such a plugin, your browser establishes a direct connection to Instagram's servers.

Instagram thereby receives the information that you have accessed the corresponding page of our website. If you are logged into your Instagram account at the time of your visit, Instagram can associate the visit with your account.

sections.title: Your Rights under GDPR
content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Right to information (Art. 15 GDPR): You can request information about your processed personal data.
- Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR): You can request the correction of incorrect data or the completion of your stored data.
- Right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR): You can request the deletion of your stored data.
- Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
- Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
- Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR)
- Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR)

sections.title: Contact
content: If you have any questions about data protection, please send us an email or contact our data protection officer directly:
TREU Service GmbH
Data Protection Officer
Rheinische Straße 220
44147 Dortmund
Email: info@roketx.de

items.q: How does the initial contact work?
items.a: After your inquiry, we will get back to you within 24 hours. When booking an appointment, you can directly choose a suitable time for a 30-minute initial consultation.

items.q: In which languages can we communicate?
items.a: We communicate in German and English. Our developers also speak Turkish.
Our business hours are Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. In urgent cases, we are also available via WhatsApp outside these hours.

items.q: How long does an initial consultation take?
items.a: The free initial consultation takes 30 minutes. If needed, we can extend the appointment or schedule a follow-up meeting.

items.q: What information do you need for a quote?
items.a: Helpful information includes: project scope, timeline, budget expectations, and special requirements. The more detailed, the better we can create a suitable offer.

items.q: How quickly can you start a project?
items.a: The start time varies depending on current project volume and the scope of your project. Typically, we can begin implementation within 2-4 weeks.
